p: The SWAT model includes sub-basins, reservoirs, and channel-routing components. The sub-basin component simulates runoff, erosion, soil water movement, evapotranspiration, crop growth and yield, soil nutrient and carbon cycling. The reservoir component detains water, sediment, and pollutants. Finally, the channel component routes flows and sediments and degrades nutrients, pesticides, and bacteria during transport ( Douglas-Mankin et al., 2010).
